title: 01/12/2021 - HOUR 2 - Herd Hierarchy, Steelers, Nick Saban

description:
Herd Hierarchy: Colin ranks the top NFL teams still in the playoffs

Steelers are starting to talk too much

Nike Saban may hire Bill O'Brien as his offensive coordinator


Guests: Peter King, Andrew Whitworth
